flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at 0.1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4>>4
He has to run 6 miles without the album because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=6>>6
Without music he runs 4/60 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 4/60
He will run the remaining 6 miles in 90 minutes because 6 / (4/60) = <<6/(4/60)=90>>90
It will take him 130 minutes in total because 40 + 90 =<<40+90=130>>130
#### 130

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
